com.foreach.across.modules.entity.config.entities

Class EntityQueryParserConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.modules.entity.config.entities.EntityQueryParserConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntityConfigurer

    @Configuration
public class EntityQueryParserConfiguration
extends Object
implements EntityConfigurer
    Configures default EntityQueryParser on all entities having a EntityQueryExecutor.
    Since:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme
